resources.name: Patient Service API
resources.description: Complete API collection for Patient Service - Tiny Steps Healthcare Platform

resources.name: Patient Service
resources.description: Patient Service API Collection for Tiny Steps Healthcare Platform

resources.name: 1. Patient Management
resources.description: Core patient CRUD operations, search, and business logic

resources.name: Create Patient
resources.description: Register a new patient in the system

resources.name: Get Patient by ID
resources.description: Retrieve complete patient information by ID

resources.name: Get Patient by User ID
resources.description: Find patient record using their user account ID

parameters.name: bloodGroup
parameters.description: Blood group: O+, O-, A+, A-, B+, B-, AB+, AB-

resources.name: Search by Age Range
resources.description: Find patients within specific age range

resources.name: Update Medical Info
resources.description: Update height, weight, and blood group

resources.name: Check Profile Completeness
resources.description: Get percentage of completed profile fields

resources.name: Get Missing Profile Fields
resources.description: List which profile fields are missing

resources.name: 2. Medical History
resources.description: Patient medical history and conditions management

resources.name: Get Medical History by Patient
resources.description: Get all medical conditions for a patient

resources.name: Add Medical History (Simple)
resources.description: Quick way to add medical condition

resources.name: Get Recent Medical History
resources.description: Get medical history from last N days

parameters.name: daysBack
parameters.description: Number of days to look back

resources.name: Get Medical History Statistics
resources.description: Get statistics about medical conditions (Admin only)

resources.name: Get Patient Allergies
resources.description: Get all allergies for a patient

resources.name: Check Has Allergy
resources.description: Check if patient has specific allergy

resources.name: Search by Allergen
resources.description: Find all patients allergic to specific substance

resources.name: Get Patient Medications
resources.description: Get all medications for a patient

resources.name: Get Current Medications
resources.description: Get medications patient is currently taking

resources.name: Get Emergency Contacts
resources.description: Get all emergency contacts for patient

resources.name: Add Emergency Contact (Simple)
resources.description: Quick way to add emergency contact

resources.name: 7. Advanced Search
resources.description: Advanced patient search and filtering capabilities

resources.name: Search by Medical Condition
resources.description: Find patients with specific medical condition

resources.name: Search by Allergy
resources.description: Find patients allergic to specific substance

resources.name: Search by Age Range (Advanced)
resources.description: Find patients within specific age range with pagination

resources.name: Find Patients with Critical Allergies
resources.description: Find all patients with life-threatening allergies

resources.name: Find High-Risk Patients
resources.description: Find patients with multiple risk factors

resources.name: 8. Health Summary
resources.description: Comprehensive patient health summaries and dashboards

resources.name: Get Patient Dashboard
resources.description: Get key health metrics for patient dashboard

parameters.name: daysBack
parameters.description: Number of days to look back

resources.name: Get Patient Addresses
resources.description: Get all addresses for a patient

resources.name: Get Address IDs
resources.description: Get list of address IDs for patient
